sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <description>(Incidental, out of turn) Immediately after being hit by a successful combat check but before damage is calculated, the character may spend one Destiny Point to increase his soak by a number equal to his ranks in Resilience.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>false</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Heroic Resilience</name> <number>TAL0001251</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-05 22:47:18</sys_created_on> <sys_id>31ed2f652f18a850e0f497eef699b6ac</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-05 22:47:18</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
